name: Smooth-Rides-Society
description: The Automotive App is a web-based application designed to provide car enthusiasts and potential buyers with a comprehensive platform to explore, manage, and interact with a variety of sports cars. Built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, this application offers a user-friendly interface that allows users to perform full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on car listings while ensuring a secure and engaging experience through session-based authentication.
